que: How long is a regulation NBA game?
expl: An NBA game is 4 quarters of 12 minutes each, for a total of 48 minutes.

que: What manufacturer makes the official NBA game ball?
expl: The Spalding Basketball has been the official game ball of the NBA since 1983.

que: Who won the highest scoring NBA game ever?
expl: The Detroit Pistons beat the Denver Nuggets 186 to 184 in 1983.

que: Which former player was the inspiration for the NBA logo?
expl: Alan Siegel, who designed the logo in 1969, says it's based on a photograph of Jerry West.

que: How long is an NBA overtime period?
expl: The NBA allows 130 seconds before any five minute overtime period.

que: How many points is a touchdown worth?
expl: The answer is 6. The extra point makes a total of 7.

que: How many people are there in an official tug of war team?
expl: Tug of war contests usually pit two teams of eight players against each other.

que: How many different ways are there to score in football?
expl: 5 ways. Touchdown, field goal, extra point, safety, and a two point conversion.

que: Which Baseball team has won the most World Series titles?
expl: The Yankees have won more titles than any other franchise with 27 title wins.

que: Where did the game of Chess originate?
expl: The most commonly held belief is that chess originated in India before 6th century AD.

que: Which was the first country to host the Asian games?
expl: India is a founder member of Asian Games and also the host of the first Asian Games.

que: Free throw is associated with?
expl: Free throw is associated with Basketball.

que: The word Jump ball is associated with?
expl: A jump ball is a method used to begin or resume play in basketball.

que: First time Common-wealth Games were played in?
expl: The first Commonwealth Games were held in Canada in 1930 in Hamilton, Ontario.

que: The distance of marathon race is?
expl: The marathon is a long-distance race with an official distance of approximately 26 miles.

que: How many players of each soccer team are there playing in the pitch?
expl: Each team shall field 11 players on the field at one time.

que: How many players are there in a basketball team when having a game?
expl: Basketball is played with two teams, with 5 players from each team on the court at one time.

que: Which sport is played on the largest pitch?
expl: The sport with the largest pitch would be polo of the horse variety.

que: Which sport do the Oklahoma City Thunder play?
expl: The Thunder competes in the National Basketball Association NBA

que: A teacher at YMCA invented basketball.
expl: James Naismith a teacher at YMCA in Massachusetts invented basketball in 1891.

que: The first Olympic Games took place in Greece.
expl: The first Olympic Games took place in Olympia Greece in 8th century B.C.

que: There are a total of 20 teams in the NBA.
expl: There are a total of 30 teams in the NBA.

que: In a relay race do each team have 5 runners.
expl: Each team has 4runners. They must pass the baton to one another without dropping it.

que: Mintonette was the original name of badminton.
expl: Mintonette was the original name of volleyball.

que: The tennis players at Wimbledon must wear all white.
expl: Wimbledon has the strictest dress code of all Grand Slam tennis tournaments. All players must wear all white.

que: The national sport of Japan is judo.
expl: The national sport of Japan is sumo wrestling.

que: Polo is not an Olympic sport.
expl: Polo was removed from the official roster of Olympic events in 1940.

que: Baseball is the only sport in USA with no game clock.
expl: Baseball has no game clock, although most games end in the ninth inning.

que: Table Tennis is the second name of ping pong.
expl: Table tennis is more widely known as Ping Pong.

que: Which sport did Mike Tyson played?
expl: MikeTyson is an American former professional boxer who competed from 1985 to 2005.

que: How high is the basketball hoop in feet?
expl: The top of the hoop is 10 feet above the ground.

que: Which is the national game of Brazil ?
expl: Football is the national sport in Brazil.

que: What is the max time to look for the ball in golf when it get lost?
expl: Under the Rules of Golf, you have three minutes to search for a golf ball. The three-minute time limit is new.

que: How many points is the touchdown worth in American football?
expl: A touchdown is worth six points.

que: The Olympic flag has how many rings?
expl: The Olympic flag has five interlaced rings in the centre: blue, yellow, black, green and red.

que: Which is the national sport of canada?
expl: National Sports of Canada Act say Hockey and Lacrosse to be national sports.

que: Which is the origin country of Tennis?
expl: Most historians believe that tennis originated in the monastic cloisters in northern France in the 12th century.

que: In a conventional game of football, how many players are fielded at a time?
expl: There are 22 players, 11 on offense and 11 on defense.

que: In high school football, how long is each quarter?
expl: Unlike the NFL and college which has four 15-minute periods, high school quarters are only 12 minutes.

que: Which NFL team has the longest season-ticket waiting list?
expl: Packers' current wait to purchase season tickets is approximately 30 years.

que: Which team won the first Super Bowl ever?
expl: Packers won the Super Bowls, defeating the Kansas City Chiefs during the inaugural event in 1967.

que: What was the first sport televised in the U.S.?
expl: On May 17, 1939, baseball became the first sport ever televised in the U.S.

que: How many dimples does the average golf ball have?
expl: The average golf ball has 336 dimples.

que: Which sport involves a bat, a ball and wickets?
expl: Cricket is a bat-and-ball game played between two teams of eleven players on a field.

que: How many pockets are there on a snooker table?
expl: A snooker table has six pockets, one at each corner and one at the center of each of the longest side cushions.

que: How many players are there in a rugby league team?
expl: A rugby league team consists of thirteen players on the field, with four substitutes on the bench.

que: What color is the centre of the target in archery?
expl: The center color of an archery target is usually gold.

que: Do you know how many players there are in an ice hockey team?
expl: Hockey is played with six players on the ice for each team, five skaters and one goaltender.

que: How many panels make up a soccer ball?
expl: A soccer ball has 32 panels. 20 of these  panels are hexagons, while the other 12 panels are pentagons.

que: How many stitches are there on a baseball?
expl: There are exactly 108 stitches on a baseball. The first and last stitches are completely hidden.
